meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by first-year classes and my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Matthew, a first-year English major. I’ve taken two difficult classes so far and am already feeling like I’m falling behind. I’m worried that I’m not measuring up to my major, and I’m worried that I’m not doing well enough to succeed. I’d like some support dealing with academic pressure and first-year anxiety.
